function NPC_501002:Init(NPCID) --[[ User Data 1: Pain누적 데미지 2: BreakPart 머리 3: BreakPart 칼날 --]] NPC_501002.UD_PAIN = 1 --NPC_501002.UD_BP_HEAD = 2 --NPC_501002.UD_BP_BLADE = 3 NPC_501002.UD_DATASIZE = 1
NPC_501002.BP_HEAD = 1 NPC_501002.BP_BLADE = 2
NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, NPC_501002.UD_DATASIZE);
NPC_501002.LIMIT_PAIN = NPC_501002.MaxHP/10 NPC_501002.LIMIT_BP_HEAD = NPC_501002.MaxHP * 0.49 NPC_501002.LIMIT_BP_BLADE = NPC_501002.MaxHP * 0.7 --NPC_501002.LIMIT_FLEE = NPC_501002.MaxHP * 1 --0.05
NPC_501002.TALENT_Provoke = 250100230 NPC_501002.TALENT_CountAttack = 250100231
NPC_501002.TALENT_PAIN1 = 250100201 NPC_501002.TALENT_PAIN2 = 250100202
NPC_501002.TALENT_BackAttack = 250100212 NPC_501002.TALENT_SpinAttack = 250100210
NPC_501002.TALENT_SpinSmash = 250100217 NPC_501002.TALENT_SpinSpin = 250100218
NPC_501002.WHIRLWIND_BUFF = 40750 NPC_501002.WHIRLWIND_TTL = 10 NPC_501002.WHIRLWIND_TIMER = 1 NPC_501002.WHIRLWIND_FINISH = 250100222 end
function NPC_501002:OnBPartRecover() for i=1, NPC_501002.UD_DATASIZE do this:SetUserData( i, 0) end -- for end
-- Talent Callback Func function NPC_501002:OnFinishAndAggroSwap( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_501002:ProcessAccDamage( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) local currentTalent = ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() local mode = ThisNPC:GetMode() local MODE_DEFAULT = 0 local MODE_PROVOKE = 2 -- 도발 local hp = ThisNPC:GetHP()
-- 도발 if mode == MODE_PROVOKE and currentTalent ~= NPC_501002.TALENT_Provoke then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:FaceTo(HitInfo.Attacker) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_501002.TALENT_CountAttack ) --ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_501002.TALENT_CountAttack, HitInfo.Attacker ) return end
--GLog("hp "..hp.." limit "..NPC_501002.LIMIT_BP_HEAD) if hp < NPC_501002.LIMIT_BP_BLADE and not ThisNPC:CheckBPart( NPC_501002.BP_BLADE ) and mode == MODE_DEFAULT then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_501002.TALENT_PAIN2 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart( NPC_501002.BP_BLADE, HitInfo.Attacker ) return elseif hp < NPC_501002.LIMIT_BP_HEAD and not ThisNPC:CheckBPart( NPC_501002.BP_HEAD ) and mode == MODE_DEFAULT then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_501002.TALENT_PAIN2 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart( NPC_501002.BP_HEAD, HitInfo.Attacker ) return end
-- pain 패턴 local damageAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_501002.UD_PAIN ) + HitInfo.Damage if damageAcc > NPC_501002.LIMIT_PAIN and ChkMFForHitReaction( HitInfo ) and mode == MODE_DEFAULT then
ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_501002.UD_PAIN, 0 ) ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_501002.TALENT_PAIN1 ) return end ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_501002.UD_PAIN, damageAcc )
end
function NPC_501002:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) -- GLog("NPC_501002:OnHitCapsule_1_0") NPC_501002:ProcessAccDamage( this, 0, HitInfo ) end
-- 휠윈드 function NPC_501002:OnFinishStartWhirl( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_501002.WHIRLWIND_BUFF ) ThisNPC:SetTimer( NPC_501002.WHIRLWIND_TIMER, NPC_501002.WHIRLWIND_TTL, false )
AsNPC(ThisNPC):Aggro("random", 0) end
function NPC_501002:OnActEndWhirl( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_501002.WHIRLWIND_BUFF ) end
function NPC_501002:OnTimer( Index ) if not Index == NPC_501002.WHIRLWIND_TIMER then return end this:ClearJob() this:UseTalentSelf( NPC_501002.WHIRLWIND_FINISH ) end
-- 휘두르기 function NPC_501002:OnFinishSpinAttack( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) local dist = ThisNPC:DistanceTo( Enemy ) local isFront = Enemy:IsFront( ThisNPC )
if dist < 600 and isFront then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_501002.TALENT_SpinSmash ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_501002.TALENT_SpinSpin ) end end
-- 후방 공격 function NPC_501002:BackAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local dist = ThisNPC:DistanceTo( Enemy ) local isRear = Enemy:IsRear( ThisNPC )
if dist < 200 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_501002.TALENT_SpinAttack ) elseif dist < 500 and isRear then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_501002.TALENT_BackAttack ) end end
